nodes.title: Fixed a non-deterministic test and a few scheduler leaks.
Figuring out why the build fails
Disable MySQL and PostgreSQL on travis
Javadoc improvements for new Single class
Observable.from(iterable) - ensure it.hasNext() is not called unnecessarily #3006
Replace the Java 7 AssertionError(message, cause) with initCause
Fix a wrong assertion in assertError
switchIfEmpty - fix backpressure bug and lost requests
switchOnNext - ensure initial requests additive and fix request overflow
takeWhile(predicate) - include last value in error cause
Fix value rendering in error last cause for primitive types
takeUntil(predicate) - include last value in error cause
prevent take() from requesting more than needed
Operator exists() - implement backpressure and include last value in exception cause
fix skip() race condition and request overflow
OperatorAll  - implement backpressure and include last value in exception cause
Add example of dependency for Gradle
Deprecate and rename two timer overloads to interval
observeOn: option to batch-request instead of at end of a drain-run.
Fixed window(time) to work properly with unsubscription, added
Added experimental to() method for fluent type conversions.
Set of standard producers and updated queue implementations with some
fix OperatorConcat race condition where request lost
OperatorObserveOn should not request more after child is unsubscribed
OperatorConcat - prevent request overflow and fix race condition
OperatorGroupBy - check for request overflow and don't decrement when at Long.MAX_VALUE
publish: Fix another race between terminalEvent and the queue being empty.
Fixed Observable.combineLatest overflow bug on Android
Add code quality plugins to build.gradle (jacoco, findbugs)
CachedObservable that supports backpressure and disconnection.
Fix termination race condition in OperatorPublish.dispatch
OperatorObserveOn onComplete can be emitted despite onError being called
Merge and MergeMaxConcurrent unified and rewritten
OnBackpressureLatest: Non-blocking version of the toBlocking().latest() operator.
Fix the performance degradation due to different schedule execution and
Fix the drainer to check if the queue is empty before quitting.
Fixed schedule race and task retention with ExecutorScheduler.
Use singleton Operators where we can
Prevent ExceptionsTest from hanging when testing stack overflow
Operators toList and toSortedList now support backpressure
Observable.from(empty) to emit onComplete even when 0 requested
Observable.range - add unit test for eager completion on empty
Concat: fixed reentrancy problem in completeInner
OnSubscribeRange Producer field should be volatile
OperatorScan - don't call onNext after onError is called
VarArg parameters for the assertReceivedOnNext(T... items)
Use singleton reduction functions in count and countLong
Use the correct accounts for sonatype sync
Fixed reentrancy issue with the error producer.
Use simpler naming in Action1, Func1 to assist IDEs
Ensure OperatorZipTest.testZipRace does not fail on slower machines
OperatorSingle should request exactly what it needs
toBlocking.single should not request more than needed
Fixes wrong request accounting in AbstractOnSubscribe
Change retryWhen to eagerly ignore an error'd source's subsequent events
Add 'request(Long.MAX_VALUE)' in 'onStart' to fix the backpressure issue of debounce
Fix for repeat: wrong target of request
Fix typo in OnSubscribe interface's Javadoc
Some Repeat + Retry methods, fix to SubscriptionArbiter.
Lambda-based subscribe and lifecycle tracking methods
Operator concatMap and related convenience methods
All standard schedulers ported and cleaned up.
Operators all, any, count, elementAt, single
The skips and filter operators added to Observable
Operators of skip (untimed), filter; fix to takeUntil
Operators of take (untimed), plugin error reporting fix for other
Added a bunch of basic event sources and helper Subscription
Schedulers (a few) + API, slight modifications to other classes,
Disposable interface and a bunch of general resource containers.
PublishSubject, AsyncSubject and a few helper classes
Refactored exception reporting of most operators.
RS dependency, some basic Observable/Observer methods.
Scan backpressure and first emission fix
Merge can now operate in horizontally unbounded mode.
Fixed negative request due to unsubscription of a large requester
Making a cross between defer() and just()
SafeSubscriber - report onCompleted unsubscribe error to RxJavaPlugin
Add Observable.fromCallable() as a companion for Observable.defer()
Add semantic-named override for unsubscribe-action subscription.
Window operators now support backpressure in the inner observable.
Remove redundant final modifier from static method in Actions
Fix retry with predicate ignoring backpressure.
Allow to use null as error for TestSubscriber.assertError()
Remove redundant type parameter in EmptyAction
Improve performance of NewThreadWorker, disable search for setRemoveOnCancelPolicy() on Android API < 21
Observers package test coverage and fixes.
Test coverage of rx.functions utility methods.
Unit tests and cleanup of JCTools' queues.
Fix take swallowing exception if thrown by exactly the nth onNext call to it.
Fix request != 0 checking in the scalar paths of merge()
add code quality plugins to build.gradle
Hardened both cache() and replay() against child-thrown exceptions.
break tests as approach timeout so that don't fail on slow machines
Observable.x(ConversionFunc) to allow extensions to Observables
switchOnNext() - fix lost requests race condition
Add "since" annotations to javadocs for new Experimental/Beta methods
Improve toSingle() javadoc (diagram, see also, since-annotation)
add and improve javadoc in Subscriber
New experimental operator to switch the types on the completion of empty Observables.
Reduce test failure likelihood of testMultiThreadedWithNPEinMiddle
Backpressure support for most BufferUntilSubscriber use places.
single: add toSingle method to Observable
Window with Observable: fixed unsubscription and behavior
takeLast() javadoc fixes, standardize parameter names (count instead of num)
range() and from() run in fast-path in case request is at least the
Operator requestBatching to change the in-flight event amounts
Replaced tabs with spaces for good.
Delay: error cut ahead was not properly serialized

More tests and bugfixes to operators.

Fix attempt to the firehose test.
First unit test and fixes to operators.

Standard disposables, changes to resource containers to support them.

Fixed debounce behavior, added throttleFirst, throttleLast alias
Operator scan, reduce. Fixes to TestSubscriber async behavior.

Fixes to classes, convenience operators mostly.

1.x: perf benchmark for the cost of subscribing
1.x: add a source OnSubscribe which works from an array directly
1.x: overhead reduction for merge and flatMap
1.x: Fix other places that may swallow OnErrorFailedException
1.x: compensation for significant clock drifts in schedulePeriodically
Clarify contracts of CompositeSubscription in its javadoc
1.x: fix: bounded replay() not requesting enough for latecommers
1.x: Change the signature of ignoreElements is also an implicit cast to whatever type you want.
2.x: Remove duplication of Optional API behavior.
1.x: DelaySubscription with a plain other Observable.
1.x: Completable class to support valueless event composition + tests
2.x: Completable class for valueless event composition.
Better null tolerance in rx.exceptions.*Exception classes.
1.x: Add action != null check in OperatorFinally
2.x: fix GroupBy MissingBackpressureException due to main/group overflow
Deprecate the Experimental/Beta method that will be deleted until 1.1.x
2.x: fix operator Amb eager cancellation and request validation
2.x: fix to ReplaySubject not properly accounting for emitted events.
DoOnEach: report both original exception and callback exception.
1.0.15. Beta/Deprecation of Subject state peeking methods.
1.1.0: promote doOnRequest to be part of the public API
1.1.0: promote Subscriptions.unsubscribed to be part of the public API
1.1.0: promote Subscribers.wrap to be part of the public API
1.1.0: promote switchIfEmpty with Observable to the public API
1.1.0: BackpressureDrainManager promotion to public internal API?!

Fix typo in a comment inside Observable.subscribe
2.x: fix SpscLinkedArrayQueue leaves 1 slot null just before growing
2.x: UnicastSubject fix for the child becoming visible before onSubscribe is called.
2.x: CombineLatest removed leftover debug field + better cleanup
2.x: perf comparing Observable, NbpObservable, Stream and ParallelStream
Observable.empty().collect() should not throw an exception
2.x: non-backpressure NbpObservable all relevant operators + tests.
Remove unused field updater from SubjectSubscriptionManager
2.x: Added placeholder operators to NbpObservable + special observables
Make field final and remove unnecessary unboxing in OnSubscribeRedo.RetryWithPredicate
Possible multithreading bug fix in OnSubscribeAmb
Remove unused private method from CachedObservable and make "state" final
Fix synchronization on non-final field in BufferUntilSubscriber
2.x: Single class more operators + test from 1.x
Fix to a bunch of bugs and issues with AsyncOnSubscribe
2.x: perf comparison of Observable, NbpObservable and Single
2.x: perf change wait to spin-loop for short async benchmarks
2.x: perf checks for flatMap and merge
Remove redundant onStart implementation in OperatorGroupBy
test/subjects: Use statically imported never() methods
2.x: fix delaySubscription with supplied publisher: wrong value to trigger subscription
2.x: disposable unit tests + fix to RefCountDisposable behavior
Add How to Contribute wiki link
2.x: fix SchedulerLifecycle.testStartIdempotence vs cached threads dying
2.x: full JDK 6 compatible backport + including bugfixes up to today
1.x: CombineLatest now supports any number of sources
Add wrapper task and update to gradle 2.10
1.x: fix unsubscription and producer issues in sample(other)
2.x: Add support for concurrently inserting actions while advancing time
Adding support for concurrently inserting actions while advancing time
1.x: fix Amb sharing the choice among all subscribers
1.x: fix SyncOnSubscribe not signalling onError if the generator crashes
handle predicate exceptions properly in skipWhile
1.x: ConcatMapEager allow nulls from inner Observables.
1.x: Added MergeDelay operators for Iterable of Observables
use Exceptions.throwOrError to simplify error handling
1.x: Fix NPE in CompositeException when nested throws on initCause
1.x: just() now supports backpressure (+ related fixes/changes)
delaySubscription(Func0) does not use a scheduler
1.x: fix counted buffer and window operators' backpressure behavior
1.x: concat reduce overhead when streaming a source
Fix the initialization order in GenericScheduledExecutorService
Remove the need for javac to generate synthetic methods.
1.x: fix Completable.using not disposing the resource if the factory crashes during the subscription phase.
clarify behaviour of groupBy in javadoc
1.x: No more need to convert Singles to Observables for Single.zip()
Deprecate Observable.finallyDo() and add Observable.doAfterTerminate() instead
Replace never() calls in BehaviorSubjectTest with verifyNoMoreInteractions
Corrected buffer operator onError behaviour documentation
1.x: fix toMap and toMultimap not handling exceptions of the callbacks
Remove double whitespace in if conditions
1.x: fix observeOn resource handling, add delayError capability
Add Single.zip() for Iterable of Singles
1.x: Don't swallow fatal errors in OperatorZipIterable
1.x: Avoid to call next when Iterator is drained
1.x: BlockingUtils test: clear interrupted flag before/after
1.x: add shorter RxJavaPlugin class lookup approach.
1.x: eager concatMap to choose safe or unsafe queue based on platform.
1.x: split Android detection and version detection
1.x: combineLatest can now combine arbitrary number of sources
1.x: enable operator/source fusion by named operator lifter
1.x: Test adjustments to reduce problems when tests run on Android
1.x: operator mapIO which is like map but allows checked exceptions
2.x: fix takeLast(time) replay behavior causing discontinuity
1.x: make scan's delayed Producer independent of event serialization
1.x: fix scan() not accepting a null initial value
1.x: fix from(Iterable) error handling of Iterable/Iterator
Provide factories for creating the default scheduler instances.
1.x: fix switchMap/switchOnNext producer retention and backpressure
TestScheduler: Fix race condition in queue
1.x: Add system property for disabling usage of Unsafe API
simplify OperatorObserveOn now that error is a non-volatile field
1.x: make defensive copy of the properties in RxJavaPlugins
1.x: Add assertSubscribed() to TestSubscriber analog to assertUnsubscribed()
1.x: Upgrading AsyncOnSubscribe from Experimental to Beta
1.x Provide public constant instead of UnsafeAccess.isUnsafeAvailable()
1.x: Fix prolonged Producer retention in switchOnNext
1.x: fix merge/flatMap crashing on an inner scalar of null
1.x: Fix typos in documentation and some code
Changed just() function in Observable class to varargs.
2.x: add ConsumableX to the base types, update method signatures
1.x: observeOn now replenishes with constant rate
1.x: Fix Observable delay methods typos in documenation
1.x: fix GroupBy delaying group completion till all groups were emitted
2.x: rename and refactor classes to match the design document
1.x: Add an operator to throttle data via controlling the requests going upstream
Upgrading SyncOnSubscribe from experimental to beta
1.x: Deprecate CompositeException constructor with message prefix
1.x: fix ExecutorScheduler and GenericScheduledExecutorService reorder bug
1.x: Operator sample emits last sampled value before termination.
1.x: measure flatMap/concatMap performance when used as filter
1.x: Fix the test Issue1685 not waiting long enough.
1.x: new operators buffer(While/Until) with predicate-based boundary
Creating Observable#create overloads for SyncOnSubscribe and AsyncOnSubscribe
scan should pass upstream a request of Long.MAX_VALUE
1.x: Add vararg of Subscriptions to CompositeSubscription.
Update information about jar size in README.md
1.x: Make the javadoc task generate correct docs
1.x: fix mapNotification's last item backpressure handling
1.x: Fix Completable using JDK 7 suppressed exceptions feature
1.x: unified onErrorX and onExceptionResumeNext and fixed backpressure
1.x: Fix zip() - observer array becoming visible too early and causing NPE
Added retry and retryWhen support for Single
1.x: onErrorResumeNext(Func1) should not call plugin handler there
1.x: fix observeOn resource handling, add delayError capability
1.x: change publish(Func1) to use a dedicated subject-like dispatcher
